page.title: 19Housing in Penn Area
page.content: The area around our school is mainly residential. It consists of more or less entirely semi-detached houses. All the houses are privately owned and none are owned by the council.They have decent sized gardens and quite a lot have a garage. The houses are not terraced and only a few are detached. The house interiors range from two to four bedrooms and all have at least one bathroom. They mainly have seperate dining rooms and lounges although some have just one big room. The kitchens are usually a reasonable size although some may be a bit cramped. A couple of the houses in the area have solar panelling but most houses have central heating. The area is a smokeless zone and so no wood or coal fires are allowed to be burnt, although a few houses use smokeless fuel.
